title: Earning S grade, not getting chest
body: Got a S on my last Poppy game (10-0-13) but i did not received a chest? I still got 1 chest that i can get for this week... Anyone else has the same problem?

replies.body: Did you already get a chest on poppy during s6?

You probably already earned your chest on her this season and didn't realize it. Go into your Champion menu, and look for a gold border around Poppy. If one's there, then you already earned your chest for her this season.
I own the champion if anyone is wondering
